channel.title: tools on openQA bites
channel.description: Recent content in tools on openQA bites

item.title: seidl - display current SUSE publiccloud images in your terminal
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: seidl is a small pint query utility designed to easily list the current publiccloud images in the terminal. Pint (Public Cloud Information Tracker) is the SUSE service to provide data about the current state of publiccloud images across all supported public cloud service providers.

item.title: VS Code and poetry
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: poetry is (yet another) python packaging and dependency management system. In this blog post I’m gonna describe how I am working with poetry repositories within VS Codium, the freely licensed variant of VS Code.

item.title: pasta - stupid simple pastebin service
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: pasta is a stupid simple pastebin service for self-hosting. I started this project months ago because I was missing an easy, simple and no pain self-hosting solution.
